short_summary: the agency has invited only suppliers currently pre-qualified on supply arrangement e60pv-19equipment to bid
description: Only Suppliers currently pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI have been invited to bid.
full_summary:
## Notification of Tender
### Title
Centrifuge and Rotor Equipments

### Solicitation Number
PW-22-01005242

### Publication Date
August 24, 2022

### Tender Closing Date
October 3, 2022, at 14:00:00

### Tender Status
Expired

### Procurement Category
Goods (GD)

### Notice Type
Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)

### Selection Criteria
Please refer to the solicitation document for the selection criteria.

### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity
Canada

### Regions of Delivery
British Columbia

### Contracting Entity Name
Canadian Food Inspection Agency

### Contact Information
The contact person for this tender is:
Nadege Muhimpundu
Nadege.Muhimpundu@inspection.gc.ca

### Solicitation Documents
The solicitation documents can be found at the following URL:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/24/bf853b85431e0491f684b10eb4f36870/a0203b-npp.pdf

### Pre-qualified Suppliers
Only suppliers currently pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI have been invited to bid.

---

### Details
* It is expected that there may be only one supplier who is currently pre-qualified on this Arrangement for the goods described in the solicitation document.
* The invitation to bid will be limited to this supplier, subject to confirmation of their eligibility to bid.
* The offeror must comply with the solicitation document and any inquiries regarding this procurement must be directed to the contact person.

---

### What to do
To participate in this procurement, please download the solicitation document and follow the instructions as outlined in the document.

I rewrote the provided text keeping in mind the public nature and expected professionalism of a government tender announcement. Here is how I structured this:

* Removed unrelated fields
* Simplified titles and descriptions
* Standardized formatting and markdown title headers
* Emphasized clear instructions to bidders and explorers
* Focused on relevant, required details
